Materia.Nodes.Atomic.AONode: Produces an ambient occlusion image from the provided image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.BitmapNode: Loads an external image file to use in the graph
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.BlendNode: Blends two image nodes together based on various blending modes
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.BlurNode: Performs a gaussian blur on the image input
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.ChannelSwitchNode: Swaps channels of two image nodes to create a new image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.CurvesNode: Adjusts the input image color curves
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.DistanceNode: Extend a mask with a smooth falloff (use sparingly as it is pretty gpu intensive)
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.EmbossNode: Performs an emboss on the input image. The resulting image is grayscale
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.FXNode: An advanced node for doing iterations, quadrants, and other complex effects
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.GradientDynamicNode: Applies a user provided gradient and maps it to the provided image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.GradientMapNode: Creates a gradient and maps it to the provided image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.GrayscaleConversion: Convert a color image into grayscale based on RGBA weighting
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.HSLNode: Adjust the Hue, Saturation, or Lightness of an image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.InputNode: Specifies an input image for graph instances
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.InvertNode: Invert RGBA channels of an image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.LevelsNode: Adjust the RGB levels of an image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.MeshDepthNode: Renders the grayscale depth view of a provided 3D model
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.MeshNode: Renders a mesh with the provided with user specified textures
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.MotionBlurNode: Performs a gaussian motion blur on the image input
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.NormalNode: Converts an image into a Normal map
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.OutputNode: Specifies an image output for graph instances
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.PixelProcessorNode: Allows direct manipulation of pixels using a graph function
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.SequenceNode: The input is provided to the sequence of outputs from top to bottom
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.SharpenNode: Uses an unsharp mask filter to sharpen the image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.SwitchNode: Switches between two images based on a provided boolean value
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.TextNode: Renders text with the selected font and settings
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.TransformNode: Scale, rotate, and translate the input image
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.UniformColorNode: Creates a solid color with alpha channel
Materia.Nodes.Atomic.WarpNode: Warps the input image, based on a grayscale input, and can apply a blur to the resulting warp
Materia.Nodes.Items.CommentNode: Adds a comment box to the graph
Materia.Nodes.Items.PinNode: Adds a pin that allows navigation between pins with the tab key
